name: My First Browser Game
description:
Reach the kennel to complete each level. If the controls aren't working, try refreshing.

Controls:

  • A/D/Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Move left/right
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • R - Restart level
  • W/Up Arrow - activate doors/switches
  • W/S/Up Arrow/Down Arrow - Move up and down ladders

Credits:

  • Programming/Additional Art - Krioboly (me)
  • Environment Art - Shackhal (https://shackhal.itch.io/multi-platformer-tileset)
  • Music - Abstraction (http://www.abstractionmusic.com/)
  • Sound Effects - Beep Yeah! (https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack)
